languages.text: {n}Идира хватается за голову и хрипит:{/n} "С судьбой аккуратно обращаться нужно. То, что сейчас может добром обернуться, потом назад должок попросит. Но и наоборот бывает — чтобы в будущем сладкие плоды пожинать, нужно горечи испить сначала. Думайте, что говорить собрались!"

{n}Idira clutches her head and wheezes:{/n} "Be wary when toying with destiny. What gives a boon now will come back to collect later. So may the opposite be true — to harvest sweet fruits in the future, one must first drink one's fill of bitter things. Watch your words!"
languages.original_text: {n}Идира хватается за голову и хрипит:{/n} "С судьбой аккуратно обращаться нужно. То, что сейчас может добром обернуться, потом назад должок попросит. Но и наоборот бывает — чтобы в будущем сладкие плоды пожинать, нужно горечи испить сначала. Думайте, что говорить собрались!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira clutches her head and wheezes,{/n} "Be wary when toying with destiny. What gives a boon now will come to collect later. So may the opposite be true — to harvest sweet fruits in the future, one must first drink their fill of bitter things. Watch your words!"

{n}Idira clutches her head and wheezes,{/n} "Be wary when toying with destiny. What gives a boon now will come to collect later. So may the opposite be true — to harvest sweet fruits in the future, one must first drink their fill of bitter things. Watch your words!"

{n}Idira clutches her head and wheezes:{/n} "Be wary when toying with destiny. What gives a boon now will come back to collect later. So may the opposite be true — to harvest sweet fruits in the future, one must first drink one's fill of bitter things. Watch your words!"

{n}Idira clutches her head and wheezes:{/n} "Be wary when toying with destiny. What gives a boon now will come back to collect later. So may the opposite be true — to harvest sweet fruits in the future, one must first drink one's fill of bitter things. Watch your words!"

{n}Idira clutches her head and wheezes:{/n} "Be wary when toying with destiny. What gives a boon now will come back to collect later. So may the opposite be true — to harvest sweet fruits in the future, one must first drink one's fill of bitter things. Watch your words!"

languages.text: {n}イディラは頭を抱え、苦しげに息を吐いた。{/n}「運命を弄ぶ時は、用心してね。今は恩恵を与えるものも、いずれ代償を取り立てに来る。そしてその逆もまた然り。未来に甘い果実を収穫したければ、まずは苦いものをたっぷりと飲み干さなきゃいけないんだ。言葉には気をつけて！」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira clutches her head and wheezes:{/n} "Be wary when toying with destiny. What gives a boon now will come back to collect later. So may the opposite be true — to harvest sweet fruits in the future, one must first drink one's fill of bitter things. Watch your words!"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは頭を抱え、苦しげに息を吐いた。{/n}「運命を弄ぶ時は、用心してね。今は恩恵を与えるものも、いずれ代償を取り立てに来る。そしてその逆もまた然り。未来に甘い果実を収穫したければ、まずは苦いものをたっぷりと飲み干さなきゃいけないんだ。言葉には気をつけて！」

languages.text: {n}Idira greift sich an den Kopf und keucht:{/n} "Seid auf der Hut, wenn Ihr mit dem Schicksal spielt. Was Euch heute beschenkt, kehrt später zurück, um die Schuld einzutreiben. Und umgekehrt kann gelten: Um in der Zukunft süße Früchte zu ernten, muss man zunächst bittere Dinge trinken. Achtet auf Eure Worte!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira clutches her head and wheezes:{/n} "Be wary when toying with destiny. What gives a boon now will come back to collect later. So may the opposite be true — to harvest sweet fruits in the future, one must first drink one's fill of bitter things. Watch your words!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira greift sich an den Kopf und keucht:{/n} "Seid auf der Hut, wenn Ihr mit dem Schicksal spielt. Was Euch heute beschenkt, kehrt später zurück, um die Schuld einzutreiben. Und umgekehrt kann gelten: Um in der Zukunft süße Früchte zu ernten, muss man zunächst bittere Dinge trinken. Achtet auf Eure Worte!"

languages.text: {n}Idira prend sa tête dans ses mains et dit d'une voix sifflante :{/n} « La prudence est de rigueur quand on joue avec le destin. Tout cadeau a un prix qui devra être payé tôt ou tard. Mais l'inverse peut aussi être vrai : pour récolter des fruits juteux à l'avenir, il faut d'abord boire son soûl d'amers breuvages. Faites attention à ce que vous dites ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira clutches her head and wheezes:{/n} "Be wary when toying with destiny. What gives a boon now will come back to collect later. So may the opposite be true — to harvest sweet fruits in the future, one must first drink one's fill of bitter things. Watch your words!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira prend sa tête dans ses mains et dit d'une voix sifflante :{/n} « La prudence est de rigueur quand on joue avec le destin. Tout cadeau a un prix qui devra être payé tôt ou tard. Mais l'inverse peut aussi être vrai : pour récolter des fruits juteux à l'avenir, il faut d'abord boire son soûl d'amers breuvages. Faites attention à ce que vous dites ! »

languages.text: {n}Idira se agarra la cabeza y respira con dificultad.{/n} «Tenga cuidado al jugar con el destino. Lo que hoy otorga dones, mañana podría exigir compensación. Y lo contrario también es cierto: para cosechar frutos dulces en el futuro, primero ha de beberse con amargura. ¡Vigile sus palabras!».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira clutches her head and wheezes:{/n} "Be wary when toying with destiny. What gives a boon now will come back to collect later. So may the opposite be true — to harvest sweet fruits in the future, one must first drink one's fill of bitter things. Watch your words!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira se agarra la cabeza y respira con dificultad.{/n} «Tenga cuidado al jugar con el destino. Lo que hoy otorga dones, mañana podría exigir compensación. Y lo contrario también es cierto: para cosechar frutos dulces en el futuro, primero ha de beberse con amargura. ¡Vigile sus palabras!».

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉紧紧地捂着头，喘着气，开了口。{/n}“和命运做交易时一定要当心。如果命运赐予了你恩惠，日后必定会让你付出代价。因此，我们应该反其道而行之，只有先饱饮苦酒，日后才能品尝甜美的果实。舰长大人，许愿的时候一定要当心！”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira clutches her head and wheezes:{/n} "Be wary when toying with destiny. What gives a boon now will come back to collect later. So may the opposite be true — to harvest sweet fruits in the future, one must first drink one's fill of bitter things. Watch your words!"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉紧紧地捂着头，喘着气，开了口。{/n}“和命运做交易时一定要当心。如果命运赐予了你恩惠，日后必定会让你付出代价。因此，我们应该反其道而行之，只有先饱饮苦酒，日后才能品尝甜美的果实。舰长大人，许愿的时候一定要当心！”

languages.text: {n}Başını tutan İdira, hırıldayarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Kaderle oynarken dikkatli olunmalı. Şimdi nimet veren şey, sonrasında tahsil için dönecektir. Bunun tam tersi de mümkündür. Gelecekte tatlı meyveler toplamak için öncesinde acı sulardan doya doya içme gerekebilir. Söylediğine dikkat etmeli!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira clutches her head and wheezes:{/n} "Be wary when toying with destiny. What gives a boon now will come back to collect later. So may the opposite be true — to harvest sweet fruits in the future, one must first drink one's fill of bitter things. Watch your words!"

Gelecekte tatlı meyveler toplamak için öncesinde acı sulardan doya doya içme gerekebilir. Söylediğine dikkat etmeli!"
